reviews.review: Absolutely loved the game play and the Greek mythology references in the storyline were subtle yet intriguing.
Si no has jugado este Portal pero si el 2 te pierdes la mitad del mejor juego en este estilo!

Poor graphics and a very short story line. I would still recomend it to anyone who is up for the puzzles and great game play. If the game was longer and had better graphics it would easily be one of my favorites, but better graphics and story is why they invented Portal 2. All and All, a great game, go buy it. Amazing game. This will be a classic video for all time.

Of all the PC games I've played over the course of my life, very few have equaled the amazing story line and gameplay of Portal. Featuring a unique weapon, complex puzzles, and a smooth learning curve, almost anyone (even non-gamers) can become immersed in the world of Aperature Science. Along with the equally thrilling Portal 2, Valve has made a series more creative and fresh than any other in a very long time. Did I mention there's a catchy song at the end?

Update: Portal is still one of the greatest games of all time and the only one I paid the full price on Steam. Worth every dollar!

A highly recommended game (make sure you play it before Portal 2).
If you want something amazing on steam, then I highly recommend this game. Besides the main game, portal has Advanced levels and challange maps. The game being so short gives you a very high replay value. This game is set in the Half-Life universe and is a puzzle game, using portals.
The game starts out with tutorial levels, basic instructure. Level 13-18 are the real challanges, after that you're given challanges outside that of the testing chambers, all leading up to a rememberable boss fight with GLaDOS
You must get this game if you do not have it already, its an amazing game.

Do you like challenging puzzles? Do you like exercising your mind in a new inventive way? Do you like subtle humor? Do you like Silly songs? Do you like increasingly homicidal robots that force you to murder your only friend and then try to kill you? If you said yes to all these questions then you have some pretty strange tastes, but you are in luck! Because this game is just what you are looking for.
Buen juego la verdad, se me ha hecho un poco corto, pero ha valido la pena, muy recomendable a aquellos que les gusten los puzles.
Could not have asked for a more creative and thoughtful puzzle game.
One of the most delightful game experiences I ever had... until I played Portal 2, which only served to further my love for the title even more.

I was a little late to the party with this game, but it still holds up very well in terms of gameplay & humour. It is one of the very few games I've ever played that actually is as good as the hype, and will be remembered for decades as a classic. If you still haven't bought it, do so. You will not regret it.
Much shorter campaign than I expected but very fun to play.

It's a short game but it is definitely one to replay many times. The gameplay is fun and if you like puzzles then this is your game. on top of a great puzzle solving experience this game is humorous and witty. You've heard it a million times by now but this is a great game. pick it up!

My first valve game. I enjoyed the demo, and loved the game. One of my all time favorites. It's basically just platforming and puzzles, but the physics engine makes it a game that it's all about fun, not cutscenes.

Ya considerado todo un cl√°sico, esta obra no puede faltar en tu biblioteca de Steam. Un claro ejemplo de como los videojuegos, son capaces de llegar al coraz√≥n del jugador, transmitir sensaciones muy profundas y, convertirse en arte.
Recomendado especialmente si eres nuevo y quieres descubrir un juego, que por su trama, personajes, y mec√°nicas; ha marcado para siempre la industria.

Portal √© extremamente viciante por fugir completamente do senso comum de jogos em primeira pessoa e for√ßar o jogador a pensar completamente diferente de qualquer jogo que j√° tenha jogado.

I was promised cake.

There are a few games on this earth that I recomend to everyone.  This is one of those games.

This is the kind of game that makes you really appreaciate that video games are a major type of media.  Maybe you think that The Lord of the Rings is a perfect book, or that Citizen Kane is a perfect movie; when it comes to video games this is a legend that I can only compare to other perfect games.  

At times you might get frustrated if you get stuck, but the reward of the voice acting, visuals (especially in Portal 2), and funny moments are more than worth the $10 (or less thanks to steam sales) that you would spend on this AAA game.  I'm proud to have speant money on this to show other game makers that this is the kind of game I want more of.

Portal is a super fun, whitty, puzzle game where you hate your real life cause damnit why don't portal guns actually exist!! AAAAAGGGHHH..... I give Portal an 8 outta 10. the puzzles are fun and each one requires new thinking but it is a little short, especially if you happen to be pretty good at portal games, there are loads of secrets, a level of exploration that was vaguely more than i was expecting and fun after game content.
This game is awesome. Cant go wrong with cake.

Enter a world of mystery surrounding you, Chell, a test subject in aperture labratories. You find yourself trapped, but then, a voice comes on the speaker and say "Hello, and welcome to the Aperture Science computer aided enrichment center" and your journey begins. Wresting control of the A.S.P.D or the Portal Gun, you find a way through the puzzles presented to you and find your way through the maze for your cake. But that is only the begining.
